main.title: Rent a Mountain Bike in Mallorca
main.description: We’ve got Mallorca's biggest selection of mountain bikes for rent. Rent one for a half day, full day, or even a week! Simply join the listnride community and book yours today.

featured.title: Featured Mountain Bikes
featured.description: These are our most popular mountain bikes for rent. Book yours now!

more.title: More Mountain and Cross Bikes
more.description: Here's some more of our community's favourites.

selection.title: See our full selection of mountain bikes for rent here:
selection.description:
The listnride bike sharing community has a large selection of high-end mountain bikes available for you to rent. Here you’ll find mountain bikes from brands like Trek, Specialized, Ghost and Stevens, along with many others. The bikes are available in Palma, Alcudia, Can Picafort, and all across Mallorca.
A nice long ride can be the perfect way to explore Mallorca, but it can be tricky to find a mountain bike that suits your needs. Furthermore, travelling with your beloved mountain bike can be risky and stressful. So don’t worry about it -- simply join the listnride community and rent the perfect bike here!

related.title: People in Mallorca also rented Road Bikes
related.description: We've got a great selection of high end road bikes available for you.
